wikipedia_page.main: James Alfred Fletcher (10 November 1931 - 22 November 2020) was an English former footballer of the 1950s and 1960s, who played professionally for Gillingham and as a semi-professional for various clubs in Kent. After retiring from football he became a successful breeder of racing greyhounds.

response: *Jimmy Fletcher, 89, English footballer (Dartford).Mr James Alfred Fletcher
